dcterms:description: In the Spread environment, the goal of n agents is to move as close as possible to the random positions occupied by n landmarks while avoiding collisions with each other. The optimal policy would have one agent occupying one landmark, resulting in a perfect space distribution.
dcterms:title: Spread

dcterms:description: The StarCraft II Learning Environment provides a range of micromanagement tasks based on the real-time strategy game StarCraft II, where agents must develop coordinated action sequences to win combat scenarios.
dcterms:title: StarCraft II Learning Environment

dcterms:description: PettingZoo is a gym for multi-agent reinforcement learning that provides a variety of environments for testing and developing multi-agent algorithms.
dcterms:title: PettingZoo
